skillTree.name: Barded Ithilmar Steed
skillTree.description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

skillTree.name: Unicorn
skillTree.description: Its forehead adorned with a spiral horn, this noble mount carries the Spellsinger where their magical gifts are needed most.

skillTree.name: Great Eagle
skillTree.description: Fly on your wings, like an eagle. Touch the sun. Track the foe, ambush, and defeat.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Shift the Roots
skillTree.description: The most powerful Spellsingers can convince the forest to change its shape.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -6% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: One with the Forest
skillTree.description: The Spellsingers are connected to an ancient intelligence, greater than any in the world.

skillTree.name: Spells of Protection
skillTree.description: Wards against mundane dangers. There are far worse things the Spellsingers must contend with.

skillTree.name: Invigorate
skillTree.description: Her presence empowers the forest, even in the midst of the most bitter winters.

skillTree.name: Scry
skillTree.description: To be able to see the future is to be able to change it.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +3%
	(own characters in province)

Hero action success chance: +6%
	(own characters in province)

Hero action success chance: +10%
	(own characters in province)

skillTree.name: Arielâ€™s Favor
skillTree.description: Should she be wounded, the power of the Mage Queen will protect her.

skillTree.name: Life of Isha
skillTree.description: Thereafter, Isha has watched the mortal children keenly, ever alert to ways in which she might aid them.

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Smoke & Mirrors
skillTree.description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.

skillTree.name: The Enfeebling Foe
skillTree.description: When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Enfeebling Foe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Enfeebling Foe Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Withering
skillTree.description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Withering"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Withering Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Withering Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Penumbral Pendulum
skillTree.description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Penumbral Pendulum"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Penumbral Pendulum Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pit of Shades
skillTree.description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pit of Shades Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Okkam's Mindrazor
skillTree.description: The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Okkam's Mindrazor"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Okkam's Mindrazor Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Power Sap
skillTree.description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(all units in army)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: Itâ€™s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Onslaught
skillTree.description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldierâ€™s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking

skillTree.name: Potent
skillTree.description: So great is this oneâ€™s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Ariel's Chosen
backgroundSkills.description: Those whom the Mage Queen has favoured fight as if powered by her hand.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

Melee attack: +2 during forest battles
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Mystifying Miasma [HIDDEN]
backgroundSkills.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

backgroundSkills.name: Chosen of Asuryan
backgroundSkills.description: Atop a great pyramid in the highest heaven, Asuryan watches over the world alone and has never been seen by mortals.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Great Eagle and Hawk Rider units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Hoeth Wisdom
backgroundSkills.description: Whatever the motivation, legend tells that when Asuryan learned of Hoeth's actions, he rebuked the Lord of Wisdom, and in punishment, set much of Hoeth's great library ablaze.

backgroundSkills.name: Blessing of Isha
backgroundSkills.description: As the goddess of nature, Isha taught the Elves how to care for the land and gain a plentiful harvest.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Ways of Ladrielle
backgroundSkills.description: By tradition, she is the only goddess to any longer walk the mortal world, and there are tales of her coming to the aid of those lost amidst the mists of Yvresse or upon the trackless ocean.

backgroundSkills.name: Light of Lileath
backgroundSkills.description: It is claimed that she reads the intention written in the heart of every elf and judges them not by their deeds, but by their hearts desire.

backgroundSkills.name: Blade of Loec
backgroundSkills.description: The Elf legends tell that Loec often saves the souls of the dead from Slaanesh by tricking the Dark Prince out of his prize.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

backgroundSkills.name: Vaul's Will
backgroundSkills.description: Enslaved to Khaine's will, Vaul is forced to make weapons of extraordinary power for the War God's eternal battle against the great enemy.
